body.name: Professional Kitchen Knives, 3PC Chef Knife Set Sharp Knives Carving Sets for Kitchen High Carbon Stainless Steel, Japanese Cooking Knife with Gift Box
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 43 mins
features: MUTI-PURPOSE CHEF KNIFE SET - The Brewin 3pc Professional Kitchen Knife Set comes with 1× chef’s knife, 1× santoku knife, and 1x utility knife and will be your best cooking mate. The knife set can easily handle all your daily kitchen tasks as the versatile knives let you enjoy cutting, carving, slicing, chopping, and mincing meat, fruits, vegetables, and more. This luxurious Brewin boxed carving knife set is the best gift for your loved ones.

RAZOR SHARP WITH DURABLE EDGES - Sharpness is the key word for cutting knives. The razor-sharp edge is engineered with a 56+ Rockwell hardness score and is hand polished by our experienced craftsmen at 14-16 degrees per side. The combination of maximum sharpness and edge retention ensures precise and effortless cutting every time, even left-handed. DO NOT test the sharpness by touching the blade with your hand.

FULL TANG ERGONOMIC HANDLE - Triple-riveted ABS ergonomic handle with fully-forged full tang yields optimal balance, strength, stability, and durability. The extra-wide design between index and middle finger provides the most comfortable and non-slip grip, The full bolster with a finely polished spine protects your fingers from sharp edges and ensures a more suitable pinch grip.

STAIN RESISTANT AND EASY TO WASH - Brewin chef's knives are crafted from high-carbon 1.4116 German stainless steel engineered to perfection for rust and stain resistance, providing an excellent balance between long-lasting sharpness and durability. Hand wash the knives with dishwashing soap and dry them with a towel to maintain the knives’ quality.

100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE - Brewin strives to ensure complete customer satisfaction with every knife. If you're not satisfied with what you received, you can either return it for a full refund or request a replacement. If you have any other issues, feel free to contact us, we will reply immediately and do our best to solve your problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality Knife
reviews.reviewText: Bought this thinking it would be average but wow, I was impressed and for only $10.00 at the time during the holidays.Comes in a nice box and a tip protector but no blade protector, which I wish it did come with as this knife is extremely sharp!Has a very well balanced feelWonderful grip and does not feel like you need to really hold tight as the balance between the grip feels perfect.Cuts through anything and of course, proper maintenance should always be followed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect knife set.
reviews.reviewText: Sharp and holds a good edge. Worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love love love these makes a great gift also ❤️!
reviews.reviewText: These knives are great we bought first set as a gift and they loved it so much we bought a second set as another gift, and then we bought a spare set for a gift I gave away at Christmas, everyone loved them they are very sharp. Please be careful with the first cuts these are super sharp. Well made and I actually purchased a fourth set to have around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does what it’s suppose to
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice looking knife. the Damascus pattern is engraved onto a steel blade . Don't Expect 300 time folded steel .It got a little tiny dot of spot rust after a wash it that came right off. But did leave a slightly discovered dark spot about the size of , well if I made a dot with a sharpie but it’s not a black dot just a shade darker that the steel.The pattern hides it quite well.Not the absolute best steel out there but it is sharp and comes with a two stage sharpener. It holds its edge pretty well,The packaging is amazing. A very solid blue box with cut to size foam insert . Very reusable as a bot to store it in.The handle is solid and it’s full tang .The balance is quite nice.This is a budget knife. It doesn’t feel like a big honking 5 mm thick professional chopper but it is more solid that 85% of anything at Wally-mart -worldIt looks cool and does what it’s suppose to overall. Don’t expect anything over the top tho. It’s a nice looking very basic knife .It’s not what I would take to work with me in a professional kitchen but would do decent with the causal home kitchen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super sharp, easy to upkeep and the weight feels great in my hand. Nice packaging and overall great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this three knife set to use myself, and this weekend got busy doin! So comfortable to hold, sharper than I've ever had, and I am so pleased! I've bought sets before, but they have never been THIS nice or this comfortable to use. I can slice and dice easily, thinly, finely, finally! I will buy more sets shortly for gifts! I am going to keep mine in their case, and display it proudly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great for the price. I’m not a frequent cook so didn’t want to spend a lot. But I’m very pleased with how easily they slice and cut.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Elegantly boxed. Suitable for gifting.

reviews.reviewTitle: Vale lo que cuesta el producto
reviews.reviewText: Realmente estoy conforme con lo que recibí. Los cuchillos se sienten firmes y los cortes se hacen con facilidad. Verdaderamente es una buena opción para tener por primera vez un buen set de cuchillos sin gastar una fortuna.
